definition[0]: if savings, income etc are tax exempt, you do not have to pay tax on them
definition[1]: an investment on which you do not have to pay tax
example[0]: There is strong investor demand for tax-exempts.
definition[2]: tax-exempt investments, savings, income etc are not taxed
definition[3]: an organization that is tax-exempt does not have to pay tax
example[4]: Some hospitals risk losing their tax-exempt status.
